arm_group.arm_group_label: study of PEC markers and chemokines/ chemokine recep
arm_group.description: blood sample for dosage and study of PEC markers and chemokines/ chemokine receptors

brief_summary.textblock:
This prospective study aimed to validate a new prognostic approach of endothelial progenitor
      cells  associated biomarkers in patients with acute coronary syndromes .  Recruitment is
      made prospectively by two centers of Inter -region South Mediterranean,

clinical_study.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Biomarkers Associated With Endothelial Progenitor Cells Mobilization in Acute Coronary Syndromes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  acute coronary syndrome (ST + < 12 hours and ST- high risk or intermediate risk
             ),which there is an indication of percutaneous coronary intervention.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Cancer

          -  Chronic inflammatory disease

          -  Infectious disease

          -  Erythrocyte <4 G/l

          -  Thrombopénia less than 100 000/mm3  ;

intervention.arm_group_label: study of PEC markers and chemokines/ chemokine recep

clinical_study.official_title: Prognostic Value of Biomarkers Associated With Endothelial Progenitor Cells Mobilization in Acute Coronary Syndromes

other_outcome.measure: determine the technical characteristics (sensitivity and specificity) and performance (technical and predictive) of chemokines / receptors expression  in the occurrence of ECVM
Determine the above performance in the subgroup of patients defined as incompletely revascularized (at least a residual stenosis < 70%)

oversight_info.authority: France: Agence Nationale de Sécurité du Médicament et des produits de santé

primary_outcome.measure: evaluate the value of circulating endothelial progenitor cells quantification in the initial phase of ACS in predicting the occurrence of a major cardiovascular event (ECVM ) at 1 year.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: determine the technical characteristics (sensitivity and specificity) and predictive value of the number of PEC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day , one month , one year

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label
